Klaus Mueller.description: still at the library working on his research paper (conversing about Klaus Mueller and Wolfgang Schulz are discussing ways to further support Black LGBTQ+ individuals in their poetry reading event planning, including collaborating with LGBTQ+ organizations, featuring LGBTQ+ poets and artists, providing safe spaces and resources, emphasizing inclusivity, accessibility, mental health support, allyship, highlighting achievements, involving Black LGBTQ+ performers and speakers, exploring intersectionality, and offering information on local support organizations.) @ the Ville:Oak Hill College:library:library table
